__e: A man with net poised, creeps noiselessly towards the frog, who sits very still and waits.
And I can't just stand by and do nothing like I'm at work or something.
And he knew that, as your girlfriend, I wasn't gonna stand by and let him bring a table into your apartment.
I mean, just, just look at you, standing there like some...
Stop there. What are you doing with my son now?
No, no, no. Stay still, woman. Stay still.
♪ Down, down, down, down D-down, down, down... ♪ If you could just be quiet for one bit, please.
- Okay, I need you to be very still, please.
KEEP THAT THING STILL, FOR HEAVEN'S SAKE!
I must leave, because Mom can't stay put for long.
I couldn't keep still inside, in my brain, or outside in my body.
